io.werval.spi.cache

Class CacheAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.werval.spi.cache.CacheAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cache
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MapCache 

    public abstract class CacheAdapter
extends Object
implements Cache
    Cache Adapter.

    Default behaviour and Metrics handling (hits, misses, updates and removes meters).

      Create a Cache without metrics handling.
      protected CacheAdapter(Function<CacheAdapter.CacheEvent,CacheAdapter.CacheEvent.Closeable> handler)
      Create a Cache with metrics handling.

      • getOrSetDefault

        public final <T> T getOrSetDefault(String key,
                                   T defaultValue)
        Description copied from interface: Cache
        Fetch cached object for a given key or set a non-expiring default value.

        If the cache has a non-expired object for the given key, it is returned.

        Otherwise, the given default value is set in the cache and returned.

        Specified by:
        getOrSetDefault in interface  Cache
        Type Parameters:
        T - Object Type
        Parameters:
        key - Cache Key
        defaultValue - Default Value
        Returns:
        The existing cached object for the given key, or the given default value, never return null

      • getOrSetDefault

        public final <T> T getOrSetDefault(String key,
                                   int ttlSeconds,
                                   T defaultValue)
        Description copied from interface: Cache
        Fetch cached object for a given key or set an expiring default value.

        If the cache has a non-expired object for the given key, it is returned.

        Otherwise, the given default value is set in the cache and returned.

        Specified by:
        getOrSetDefault in interface  Cache
        Type Parameters:
        T - Object Type
        Parameters:
        key - Cache Key
        ttlSeconds - Default Value Time To Live in seconds. If 0 (ZERO), then the entry will never expire
        defaultValue - Default Value
        Returns:
        The existing cached object for the given key, or the given default value, never return null
